Author: gentlerose
Text: I know itâ€™s difficult to think this way especially when our disorder tells us otherwise but thinner doesnâ€™t always mean prettier. anecdotally, Iâ€™ve experienced being both fat and thin before and thinness definitely hasnâ€™t saved my ass from looking like Iâ€™ve been hit with the ugly stick a few too many times. not to mention, this person is 12 whole years younger than you!! when people are younger I feel like their bodies just deal with food in a more forgiving way, and they generally have more energy, have more time for extra activity in day to day life, have greater accessibility to particular foods if their parents are helping to pay for groceries etc etc. please donâ€™t be too harsh on yourself :( someone elseâ€™s thinness isnâ€™t a reflection of your own inadequacy. theyâ€™re a totally different person with a body that likely functions in a completely different way to yours
